# Link bewteen Natural Climate Solutions and Sustainable Development Goals

This repository contains the data and codes used to obtain results of the paper by Mariani et al. (202?) - Hit two targets with one stone with Natural Climate Solutions.

## Contents

[:file_folder: **rawdata**](rawdata/) directory contains the 0/1 matrix used to perform all analysis. See Material & Methods section of the paper for more details. This directory also contains SDG and NCS icons use in figure of the paper. 

[:file_folder: **rawdata**](rawdata/)
